creator: david_syer@hotmail.com
text: Inconsistent naming of boolean getters in StandardContext: e.g. "getTldValidation()" but "isStatisticsProvider()".  Personally I would prefer "is*".

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Patches are always welcome.

It might not be consistent but it is this way in 6.0.x and 5.5.x.

I'm not against breaking the API but I think there needs to be a better reason than just consistency.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: I don't see this changing in the Tomcat 7.0.x timeframe
